name: Rotating Clock Widget
author: Ferritech

sections.description: The Rotating Clock is an animated widget created by Ferritech that spins relative to the local time. The time is displayed at the top of the clock while a disk spins in real-time showing the relative position of the sun for your time-zone.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload Rotating Clock Widget to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Use the “Rotating Clock Widget” option in the Appearance->Widgets area and install in a widget area.
  4. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
Can I change the color of the clock font?

Currently, this is not an option. If you are savvy with HTML/CSS, then you can easily go into the plugin directory and update the ‘#bg_time’ color in the css file to the color that you want.
